title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Interiors Scheme A", May 15, 1935
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower left: 3/8 -1'-0-/A.H. / 5/15/35; Inscribed at lower left: SCHEME A; instructions in graphite
description: Plan for floor of interiors of Lady Esther Yacht; four staterooms each with bathroom and dressing room.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Interiors Scheme A", May 15, 1935.
May 15, 1935. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-422.
